meanings.definition: Spread or smear (a substance) over a surface.
meanings.sent1: She schmears butter on her toast every morning.
meanings.sent2: He always schmears sunscreen on his skin before going to the beach.
meanings.sent3: The child thought it would be fun to schmears paint all over the walls.
meanings.sent4: The artist carefully schmears colors on the canvas to create a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The chef expertly schmears sauce on the pizza, ensuring each bite is flavorful.

meanings.definition: A spreadable mixture, typically of cream cheese and other ingredients, used on bread or bagels.
meanings.sent1: She loves to have schmears of cream cheese on her bagel for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The deli offers a variety of schmears to choose from for your toast.
meanings.sent3: The cat licked the schmears of tuna spread left on the plate.
meanings.sent4: The bakery's specialty is their delicious schmears for sandwiches.
meanings.sent5: The picnic basket was filled with different schmears for everyone to enjoy.
